channel.title: Delicious on Damien Saunders
channel.description: Recent content in Delicious on Damien Saunders

item.title: Delicious finally updates its Firefox Extension
item.description: Delicious, that’s delicious.com or del.icio.us for those old enough - has finally updated its Firefox extension - though it is still a beta version, the updated extension is available in the Mozilla Add-ons applet-store If you gave up on Delicious for syncing bookmarks cause browsers added their own tools like Google Bookmarks or Firefox Sync then maybe this isn’t for you. If you’re still in love with the idea of social bookmarking - tagging and sharing your bookmarks … then this is something for you.

item.title: Delicious - I still love you
item.description: Delicious, that’s delicious.com or del.icio.us for those who can remember it - is one of the original web 2.0 social media services that specialised in social-bookmarking. We should learn to love Delicious again now that they’ve got new owners. Delicious is the original web 2.0 service we still love A few years back when something called web 2.0 was really a fluffy concept, Del.icio.us was the easy to understand social-bookmarking website.
